Congratulations on your comeback, @CocoGauff. You’re an inspiration and we’re cheering you on! 
https://bleacherreport.com/articles/2844348-15-year-old-coco-gauff-beats-polona-hercog-advances-to-round-of-16-at-wimbledon

RT @TwitchyTeam Ted Cruz schools another lib (NYC councilman) who didn’t like his reality check for Colin Kaepernick https://twitchy.com/dougp-3137/2019/07/06/ted-cruz-schools-another-lib-nyc-councilman-who-didnt-like-his-reality-check-for-colin-kaepernick/

That public “whatever” is called public sentiment.

And wielding the power to shift it is how we actually achieve meaningful change in this country. https://twitter.com/joshjame/status/1147615395018354688 QT @joshjame Speaker Pelosi says ⁦⁦@AOC⁩, ⁦@IlhanMN⁩, ⁦@AyannaPressley⁩ and ⁦⁦@RashidaTlaib “have their public whatever and their Twitter world. But they didn’t have any following. They’re four people and that’s how many votes they got.” https://www.nytimes.com/2019/07/06/opinion/sunday/nancy-pelosi-pride-parade.html

I find it strange when members act as though social media isn’t important.

They set millions of 💵 on 🔥 to run TV ads so people can see their message.

I haven’t dialed for dollars *once* this year, & have more time to do my actual job. Yet we’d rather campaign like it’s 2008.
Having an awesome time here at @essencefest! #essencefest http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-0fcxGXsAIfYgu.jpg

The right to vote for millions of Americans, disproportionately communities of color, has been under assault—it’s why less than 2% of all statewide elected executive officials are Black women. We need to expand voting rights for ALL Americans. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-y2URLW4AcE8iH.png

The political revolution continues in Nevada!  Join us in Las Vegas for a town hall on education, criminal justice, and economic rights. https://www.pscp.tv/w/b_DmCjMyNzU3OTl8MU93eFdrT01CUUF4UXHE5URgSF4diRUm0e3txM0EgsGMMbRFtJV-3IOnwY2I

The purpose of the census is to get a full and accurate count of the U.S. population. Adding a citizenship question to the census is nothing more than a blatant attempt to undermine that and weaponize the census. We won’t stand for it. 
https://twitter.com/ABC/status/1147163599040851969 QT @ABC Pres. Trump is exploring using an executive order to move forward with the battle over the 2020 census question, sources familiar with the discussions told @ABC News. https://trib.al/J0nxTVI

After generations of discrimination, it’s time to give Black families a real shot at homeownership — historically one of the most powerful drivers of wealth. My new policy will remove unfair barriers Black Americans face when they go to qualify for a home loan. #EssenceFest

July is national Parks and Recreation month. It’s critical that every child in America is able to grow up experiencing the outdoors. Yet, far too many don't even have access to a nearby park.

I introduced the Outdoors for All Act to help fix this.

I don’t believe it was a good idea for Dems to blindly trust the Trump admin when so many kids have died in their custody. It’s a huge mistake.

This admin also refuses to hand over docs to Congress on the whereabouts of families. People’s lives are getting bargained, & for what? https://twitter.com/matthewstoller/status/1147670347594043393 QT @matthewstoller This is a bet by Pelosi that @aoc is wrong and that the Trump administration will do the right thing on the border with the money Congress just appropriated. Not a bet I'd make but ok. https://twitter.com/joshjame/status/1147615395018354688

Best wishes to His Holiness the @DalaiLama on your 84th Birthday. As we celebrate this day in your 60th year in exile, we continue to stand with you and the people of Tibet in your efforts for true autonomy and  freedom of religion, language & culture in Tibet. Happy Birthday! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-zTIsvXUAE7N_x.jpg
Jersey in the house here at @essencefest! #JerseyPride #EssenceFest http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-zlR5vX4AA2MLQ.jpg

We need to protect & expand every American’s right to take part in our democracy by:
✅ Ending voter suppression
✅ Making Election Day a national holiday
✅ Ensuring universal automatic voter registration & vote by mail
✅ Restoring voting rights for formerly incarcerated people

I’m grateful to be a part of the 25th annual @EssenceFest today. I’ll see you soon! https://twitter.com/essencefest/status/1146410931557228544 QT @essencefest Meet Senator @ewarren on the #EssenceFest Power Stage where she’ll be answering your questions! Tweet us your questions for Senator Warren. https://www.essence.com/festival/app/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-jeqqBWwAECrU6.jpg

Black women are paid less and are less likely to be able to afford basic human rights like health care, child care, and housing. It’s no accident: It’s the legacy of systemic discrimination. My new plan helps right these wrongs. #EssenceFest https://www.essence.com/op-ed/elizabeth-warren-on-valuing-black-women/

I’ve met too many teachers who are working 2-3 jobs, who stay up late worrying about how they’re going to pay the bills, instead of tomorrow’s lesson plan. As president, I’ll make the largest federal investment in teacher pay in U.S. history to help close the teacher pay gap.

Thank you to all the emergency workers, utility workers, laborers, and community members working around the clock following the earthquake in California. There is a risk for future earthquakes—make sure you have an earthquake kit. Go to https://www.ready.gov/build-a-kit for a checklist.

The fight of Black women has always been fueled and grounded in faith and in the belief of what is possible. #EssenceFest http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-1Aya4XYAASIoy.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1147644136218091520/vid/320x320/K363_Q0huS8kTB31.mp4?tag=13

Another earthquake in Southern California this evening. Grateful to the first responders who are on the scene. Californians: please stay safe, check in on loved ones, and ensure you are prepared in case of another earthquake. Remember to only use 911 for emergencies. https://twitter.com/nbcnews/status/1147356216542130177 QT @NBCNews San Bernardino County Fire reports one minor injury, foundation cracks following 7.1 magnitude earthquake in Southern California https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/earthquake-shakes-southern-california-day-after-most-powerful-quake-20-n1027021 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-w6W4NUcAUNzaI.png

Thankful for California's first responders who work tirelessly to protect lives and property. Now is a good time to make sure you're prepared for a future earthquake. https://ready.gov/earthquakes 
https://twitter.com/latimes/status/1147392911933235200 QT @latimes The small town of Trona, Calif., suffered more damage from Friday night’s 7.1 magnitude earthquake and was inaccessible because of rockslides, residents said. More from @anitachabria and @r_valejandra: https://www.latimes.com/local/lanow/la-me-trona-earthquake-batters-rockslides-ridgecrest-20190705-story.html

Bleeps happen 😂 https://twitter.com/ryangrim/status/1147495533323460609 QT @ryangrim Love that @AOC got bleeped out in the Post. We call them “grown up words” in our house. https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/posteverything/wp/2019/07/05/feature/haunted-by-the-reagan-era/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-y5GpvW4AADV3a.jpg

Bizarre or an entirely predictable result of decades of tax breaks for the wealthy at the expense of working people? https://twitter.com/axios/status/1146895206806982657 QT @axios A truly bizarre trend is having an impact on the economy: Wealthy people and corporations have so much money they literally don't know what to do with it. https://www.axios.com/money-companies-investors-assets-buybacks-dividends-f0a4d79b-bfa7-4205-9d27-f09b50266307.html?utm_source=facebook&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=organic&utm_content=1100

Sad. These threats of violence show the profound fear on the far Left that people will watch this powerful true story and change their minds. https://twitter.com/lifenewshq/status/1147546995302625281 QT @LifeNewsHQ Violence is the pro-abortion movement's new form of censorship. 

But we can overcome it!

RT and help us contact this theater and urge it to stand AGAINST these pro-abortion threats and show @UnplannedMovie 

Don't let these radical pro-aborts win!

https://www.lifenews.com/2019/07/05/canadian-movie-theater-cancels-unplanned-after-abortion-activists-threaten-it/

And use that money to build the wall 👉 https://action.tedcruz.org/el-chapo/ https://twitter.com/cnnbrk/status/1147286543251456001 QT @cnnbrk Federal prosecutors want drug kingpin Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman to forfeit more than $12.6 billion to the US government, a court filing shows. "It's insane to think that Guzman would have all that money," one of his attorneys said. https://www.cnn.com/2019/07/05/us/el-chapo-guzman-us-forfeit-money/index.html http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-v68rNWwAEvh6G.jpg

I loved getting the chance to talk in person, @Ashleyn1cole! https://twitter.com/TeamWarren/status/1147643116620603393 QT @TeamWarren 😍 This whole thread 👇 #EssenceFest https://twitter.com/ashleyn1cole/status/1147581345117462530
RT @rdevro NEW: Border Patrol agents tried to delete racist and obscene Facebook posts. We archived them. https://theintercept.com/2019/07/05/border-patrol-facebook-group/

The experiences of women of color are not one-dimensional: Sexual orientation, gender identity, and ability all shape how a person’s work is valued in the workplace. Women of color work hard for their families. Our economy should work hard for them. https://medium.com/@teamwarren/valuing-the-work-of-women-of-color-c652bf6ccc9a

RT @IlhanMN Did you know over 70% of people 18-44 years old support legalizing marijuana nationally? 

https://news.gallup.com/poll/243908/two-three-americans-support-legalizing-marijuana.aspx https://twitter.com/startribune/status/1147206885218619392 QT @StarTribune Rep. Ilhan Omar says national marijuana legalization is needed to bring 'equality in our laws,' so that individual states don't get to "pick and choose." http://www.startribune.com/rep-ilhan-omar-national-marijuana-legalization-needed-for-equality-in-our-laws/512265012/

Here’s what I would’ve said to a 25-year-old me. https://twitter.com/Essence/status/1147613009130545153 QT @Essence This is what @ewarren would tell her 25-year-old self. #EssenceFest ❤️ http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1147612823507394560/pu/img/LaeKJxUkTj-0QWm5.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1147612823507394560/pu/vid/320x568/GZnqPiUixNOTnSoT.mp4?tag=10

You have been snared by the utterance of your lips,caught by the words of your mouth;

Proverbs 6:2

Our campaign is not just about winning the election. It is about empowering union campaigns like these. I stand in solidarity with @AFLCIO, @MachinistsUnion, @GoIUPAT and @ueunion in Iowa fighting against corporate trade policies. https://iowastartingline.com/2019/06/24/bernie-sanders-iowa-campaign-helps-rally-local-unions/

RT @mayaharris_ .@KamalaHarris brought down the house again today at #EssenceFest —> “The fight of black women has always been fueled & grounded in faith & in the belief of what is possible...” 🔥 @Essence @essencefest #ForThePeople http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1147557294240141312/pu/img/RFp2-DIkXvK9W1p0.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1147557294240141312/pu/vid/320x568/nc6013sDZNZbWn3V.mp4?tag=10

RT @JoyceWhiteVance This is an interesting point & reminder that @AOC's generation doesn't remember a more moderate Republican party that people my age remember. Because her views aren't clouded by memories of a party that no longer exists, they may be more accurate. https://twitter.com/mattdpearce/status/1147259612246073344 QT @mattdpearce "Ocasio-Cortez told me that she treats Republicans like buffoons because that’s how they’ve behaved for as long as she can remember." https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/posteverything/wp/2019/07/05/feature/haunted-by-the-reagan-era/?utm_term=.fa47d79ed846

As a nation, we have a moral obligation to provide the best quality care to those who have put their lives on the line to defend us. Join me live as I meet with veterans in Las Vegas. https://www.pscp.tv/w/b_ETcDMyNzU3OTl8MUJSSmp2WHJxb1FKd2RQsorvzW2dMCHfjckQVe5K0rZGpudHOgxSL1GyBSfk

Today at @essencefest, I announced that as president, I’ll invest $100 billion to put homeownership within reach for up to 4 million families. We must close the homeownership gap. 
https://kamalaharris.org/homeownership-gap

RT @Essence .@CoryBooker has big plans for Black women!! 👏🏾#EssenceFest http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1147591370867126272/pu/img/oUuQ53VeBTfOwpOf.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1147591370867126272/pu/vid/320x568/hO5c9Dr-JW3S9R4v.mp4?tag=10

We can't have “life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness” if we don't end gun violence in our communities. If every woman doesn’t have the freedom to control her own body. If we don't take steps to close the wealth gap. Grateful for today's important talk at @essencefest. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-1NATJXYAEX0EP.jpg
RT @AriRabinHavt Saturday morning town hall with @BernieSanders at Victory Missionary Baptist Church in Las Vegas http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-0O-VfU8AAGF9y.jpg

Today, at #EssenceFest, I released a new plan to start closing the racial wealth gap in our country. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-0gDZSXkAAWZto.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1147607279572848643/vid/320x320/GM3l7FBve5grkchj.mp4?tag=13

Black women are up to 4 times more likely than white women to die during pregnancy or childbirth & the situation is especially dire for Black women in the South where many states have refused to expand Medicaid. We must pass my MOMMIES Act to address this. https://everymothercounts.org/policy-and-advocacy/the-mommies-act/

Millions of people are raising money on GoFundMe right now to fund their health care and life-saving medication. To my mind, that is not a functioning health care system. We must pass Medicare for All. https://www.huffpost.com/entry/gofundme-health-care-system_n_5ced9785e4b0ae6710584b27

I’m grateful to have been a part of the 25th annual @EssenceFest! We need to use every tool in the toolbox to make our government and our economy work for communities of color, and I’m glad we had the opportunity to talk about that today. #EssenceFest http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-1OB_5XkAAdlOs.jpg

RT @Essence “Agenda of African American women has to be at the center of attention” - @CoryBooker #PowerStage #EssenceFest http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1147574181934063616/pu/img/ia1-EBSCkTniaA9b.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1147574181934063616/pu/vid/320x568/xiaeWGOTeaGyJrqb.mp4?tag=10

Let’s cancel $1.6 trillion in student debt and make public universities tuition-free instead. https://twitter.com/qz/status/1145667164436930560 QT @qz In 15 years we’ll be able to upload education to our brains. So can I stop saving for my kids’ college?   https://qz.com/1651749/brainwave-tech-will-make-college-debt-a-thing-of-the-past/?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=qz-organic&utm_campaign=hootsuite
@LaJasmine_K It was great meeting you too. Go Cougars!

Here's why the climate crisis is an equity crisis: communities of color suffer more from polluted air. These communities must be at the forefront of our fight against climate change. My bill to fund electric school buses is one step in this fight. https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2019/jun/27/us-air-pollution-north-east-mid-atlantic-analysis-union-concerned-scientists
RT @BiancaRecto Crowd here at Historic Westside is ready for @BernieSanders. Town hall starting soon! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-0CHhxUIAA_C5e.jpg

My diploma from @UHouston gave me a second chance at my dream of becoming a public school teacher. What an honor to be back last night talking with voters and grassroots supporters. Thank you, Houston—you have a special place in my heart! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-yuSrBW4AA8HFz.jpg

For too long, too many folks, particularly communities of color and women, have had to work twice as hard only to get half as far. 

We need change that.

Not only was an anti-immigrant online group by CBP officers recently revealed, but now we're learning CBP leaders knew about the group years ago & didn’t shut it down.
 
This is outrageous. DHS OIG must thoroughly investigate CBP and this culture of anti-immigrant dehumanization. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1147522112720121861 QT @washingtonpost CBP officials knew about derogatory Facebook group years ago and have investigated posts from it before https://trib.al/Bl2IMnk

I’m running for president of the United States—and yeah, I’ve got a lot of plans. Thank you, @EssenceFest! https://twitter.com/Essence/status/1147610388604882949 QT @Essence “You wanna get something done, you better have a plan to do it” - @ewarren #PowerStage #EssenceFest http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1147610110468001794/pu/img/3F1BshHtAZTZU8bB.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1147610110468001794/pu/vid/320x568/kocwhaYWVwlIRWPB.mp4?tag=10

RT @ChrissyCole Back at @essencefest with @CoryBooker today and I’m so excited! As an @Essence alum, this is a special moment. Follow along as I take over Cory’s IG Stories today to see some of my favorite parts of this iconic gathering. #essencefestival2019

On day one of a Warren administration, I will take a series of executive actions to boost wages for women of color and open up new pathways to the leadership positions they deserve. #EssenceFest
https://www.bet.com/news/national/2019/07/05/elizabeth-warren-women-of-color.html

Sometimes people say, “Kamala, talk to me about Black people’s issues.” And I’ll smile and say, you know — let’s talk about the economy. Let’s talk about health care. Let’s talk about the racial wealth gap. Let’s talk about national security. #EssenceFest

We can’t ignore that Black mothers across the country are facing a health crisis, driven in part by implicit bias in our health care system. My Maternal CARE Act would address this urgent issue and ensure women's health concerns are listened to and taken seriously.

To help ALL Americans get ahead, we should:
✅ Cap renters’ cost at 30% of income to ensure access to housing
✅ Expand the Earned Income Tax Credit
✅ Guarantee workers a $15 minimum wage & the right to collectively bargain
✅ Enact my baby bonds proposal
✅ “Ban the box”

Homeownership has historically been one of the most powerful drivers of wealth, which is why I announced a plan to shrink the racial homeownership gap, helping up to four million families with down payments and closing costs.
https://twitter.com/axios/status/1147552035002150912 QT @axios Kamala Harris pitched her new plan to invest $100 billion in black homeownership at Essence Fest in New Orleans on Saturday in an effort to close the racial wealth gap and eliminate racial disparities in U.S. homeownership rates.

https://www.axios.com/kamala-harris-new-plan-invest-billions-black-homeowners-042aa516-03cc-40cb-947c-4b9b692fb892.html?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=organic

Jamie Dimon is attacking our agenda. 

This is the billionaire CEO of a bank that:
- was fined $13 billion for mortgage fraud
- illegally foreclosed on military families
- bribed foreign officials

We welcome his hatred. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1147139747967635456/img/VW9QHdcECjQCt-p8.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1147139747967635456/vid/320x320/HxULpw8LgAAzE-_J.mp4?tag=13

No matter what Trump wants us to believe, the truth is immigrants make this country stronger. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1147560999089819648/img/syUURzqKTdCuthBQ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1147560999089819648/vid/320x320/lCLCgbaE_aNPThAv.mp4?tag=13
Three billionaires own more wealth than the bottom half of the country. That is a fact.

So grateful for you both, @LindaFoens and @sfoens! https://twitter.com/CoryForIowa/status/1147213123050508288 QT @CoryForIowa We are so thankful for our volunteers of the week, @LindaFoens and @sfoens. Their dedication to Cory's values inspires us every day. We're so happy they're on our team and in Cory's corner on caucus night! #iacaucus http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-u3v3pWsActYvy.jpg
Imagine what we would be able to accomplish if we invested in sending our kids to college instead of to war.

HBCUs made me who I am today. #EssenceFest
http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D9b1FBrW4AE8Ctm.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1141367400455114754/vid/320x320/zlfQFD_TIF_Xugyi.mp4?tag=13
